data.text:
Publish date: 2024-06-29

Biography

Michel Platini was born in Joeuf, France on June 21, 1955. Attacking midfielder who helped the French national team win the 1984 Euro Cup and was voted the best player of the tournament; spent his club career with Nancy, Saint-Etienne and Juventus and played for the French national team from 1976 to 1987. He and Zinedine Zidane are considered to be two of the greatest French soccer players of all time. He received an opportunity to play with Metz early in his career, but missed it because of an injury.

On Popular Bio, He is one of the successful Soccer Player. He has ranked on the list of those famous people who were born on June 21, 1955. He is one of the Richest Soccer Player who was born in France. He also has a position among the list of Most popular Soccer Player. Michel Platini is 1 of the famous people in our database with the age of 64 years old.
